doc.field: This series contains photographs collected and used by Ewen in publications. It includes family photographs, photographs of Brecht stage scenes for his book, Bertolt Brecht: His Life, His Art, and His Times, and portraits of Ewen, John Randolph and Sarah Cunningham. The bulk of the photographs contain headshots of actors, including Lois de Banzie, Elinor Bassescu, Robert Burr, Ludwig Donath, Judith Doty, Fredi Dundee, Joyce Ebert, Michael Ebert, Jack Gilford, Mark Gordon, Suzanne Granfield, Lucy Greene, Marvin Hayes, Madhur Jaffrey, Saeed Jaffrey, Michael Jolan, Harriet Laine, Lenore Loveman, Marya Manning, Maurine Marlowe, Beatrice Mauley, Joanna Merlin, Dino Narizzano, Marjorie Nelson, Patricia O'Connell, Dina Paisner, Fred Pinkard, Maggie de Priest, Joe Silver, Paul Sparer, Martin Wolfson, and Janis Young.
